snippet.title: The Sims 3 Into the Future -- Announce Trailer
snippet.description: Fire up the Time Portal and get ready to send your Sims hundreds of years into the future. Your Sims will experience a new way of life thanks to new future technology. Create and customize Plumbots with Create A Bot. Jump between present and future worlds at will, and experiment with how your Sims' actions in the present can have surprising effects on their own legacy, their descendants, and even the way of life for future Sims! Available October 22, 2013
